As the winter season sets in, a lot of people struggle to survive the cold.
Giving out a warm cup of good old 'chai' to a person in need can always help bring a little warmth to their lives. #KuchKarteHain

Winters are harsh and cruel. We might not realize it snuggled up in our warm indoors, but for the stray animals around us, every night is a struggle.
Help them out by putting a blanket over them or giving them shelter to spend the night in. Your every little effort can make a difference. #KuchKarteHain

Jackets, Sweaters, Gloves, Heaters. Are you ready for this winter? Unfortunately, not everyone is. Every year hundreds of Indians die in the winters. Thousands do not even have a place they can call home.

XOLO, in association with @clothesboxfoundation is taking an initiative to distribute blankets to the people in need. 
SHARE this video (link in bio) with friends and family to help someone survive the winter. Your ONE share is equal to a BLANKET for them. Chalo, #KuchKarteHain

Merry Christmas everyone!
Celebrate the spirit of Christmas by spreading warmth to those around you. Let us all try to be someone's Santa and contribute a little by gifting smiles.
Share the video * http://bit.ly/KKH_fb * to help someone get a blanket this winter.
1 SHARE = 1 BLANKET

You can help someone have a warm winter this year.
Share the video *http://bit.ly/KKH_fb* to give a needy person the gift of warmth. #KuchKarteHain
1 SHARE = 1 BLANKET

Enter this new year with a righteous feeling of have helped someone in need.
Share the video *http://bit.ly/KKH_fb* to give someone the gift of warmth. #KuchKarteHain
